summary: Explained why __dirname error occurred: file conflicts in root project (index.js, server.js, database/setup-database.js), Railway cache issues, and incorrect root directory configuration. All conflicting files have been removed and proper service structure established with backend/ and frontend/ folders properly configured.
current_status: Ready for deployment after explaining the root cause of __dirname errors. All file conflicts resolved, proper service structure in place, and comprehensive documentation provided for troubleshooting. User needs to commit changes and redeploy on Railway with correct root directory settings.
